system.description:
Weapons made up of pink-red coral harvested from pristine seas.

Effect: When you make a melee attack, you can convert any 2 or 3 on the Attack Teeth into Bleed (1) or Water Vulnerability (1) against the target.

Coral Knight Set (1/3): You become a Coral Knight. You gain water conditioning, ignore water terrain, and all your water attacks inflict 1 True Hit.
